messageBody:
Hi all,

We need to develop a standalone application which is used to test all the senarios through JUnit framework.

The main thing in that is which out using the Application Server (Websphere 5.1) and with out touching the existing code.

Our objective is, we need to create a Datasource with jndi in the same way how we are doing in the j2ee application.

Some how we created the datasource and binded to the local jvm where JUnit testcase is running.

But while running the application, we are getting the exception Naming service is not available or J2EE client or J2EE Server environment is not available.

If you have any idea, could you show some light on this problem.

Advance thanks. your ideas are welcome.

Thanks & Regards,
Ashik
